text: Akassh Sen, known simply as Akassh, is a well known Indian Bengali music composer and singer. == Career == He is a music director of Bengali feature films and television. He is also a singer and composer. His career started with his first album, Sweety, in 2004. Akassh Sen not only composes music for Indian films, but also composes music for the Bangladeshi films and albums as well. == Discography == ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
